beats.text: ‘‘Aha! Another page… but wait! It’s back; the itch! Right there... right between my shoulders. ‘I can't reach it. Help me, Little man-cub. Push!’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 14 ▓▓▓▓|you try to help|$hero_name by moving|their hands.

beats.text: ‘Ohhh... yes. Yes!’ |VS| whispered $hero_name, |VS| ‘That’s it! Grind that itch into dust. This is what the jagged edges of the world are for.’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓▓ PAGE 14 ▓▓▓▓|Now try to help|$hero_name lift|its legs.

beats.text: ‘Gone. I am a new bear. I feel light as a feather.’ |VS| said $hero_name in relief, shaking their body out. |VS| ‘Thank you. Now, while I'm still in a good mood... let's see what the winds have brought us. Let's go.’
beats.backtext: ▓▓▓▓ ✓ PAGE 14  ▓▓▓▓|A new page is|in the backpack.
